statements: SELECT influencer_id, collaboration_id, sponsorship_id, campaign_performance_metrics FROM influencer_metrics WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM influencer_metrics WHERE sponsorship_id = 100 ORDER BY collaboration_id ASC;
SELECT influencer_id, sponsorship_id FROM influencer_metrics WHERE campaign_performance_metrics->>'engagement_rate' > '0.05';
SELECT influencer_id, campaign_performance_metrics FROM influencer_metrics WHERE collaboration_id = 200 ORDER BY sponsorship_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_metrics WHERE collaboration_id IN (100, 150, 200) AND sponsorship_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT influencer_id, collaboration_id, sponsorship_id, campaign_performance_metrics FROM influencer_metrics WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM influencer_metrics WHERE collaboration_id = 5;
SELECT influencer_id, sponsorship_id FROM influencer_metrics WHERE sponsorship_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM influencer_metrics WHERE influencer_id = 2 ORDER BY collaboration_id ASC;
SELECT influencer_id, sponsorship_id, campaign_performance_metrics->>'engagement_rate' AS engagement_rate FROM influencer_metrics WHERE sponsorship_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT name, location FROM influencers WHERE followers > 10000;
SELECT influencer_id, name, location, followers FROM influencers ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT * FROM collaborations WHERE brand = 'Nike';
SELECT influencer_id, brand, start_date, end_date, payment FROM collaborations ORDER BY payment DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers > 1000 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, location FROM influencers INNER JOIN collaborations ON influencers.influencer_id = collaborations.influencer_id WHERE collaborations.brand = 'Nike' AND payment > 5000
SELECT * FROM collaborations WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY payment DESC
SELECT DISTINCT brand FROM collaborations
SELECT name, followers FROM influencers WHERE location = 'Los Angeles'
SELECT * FROM influencers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT influencer_id, name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE platform = 'Instagram';
SELECT collaboration_id, brand_name, start_date FROM collaborations WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions_count, engagement_rate, revenue_generated FROM campaign_metrics WHERE conversion_rate > 9.5;
SELECT influencer_id, name, followers_count, platform FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 50000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT influencer_id, name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE platform = 'Instagram' AND followers_count BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;

SELECT c.collaboration_id, c.brand_name, m.impressions_count FROM collaborations c INNER JOIN campaign_metrics m ON c.collaboration_id = m.collaboration_id WHERE m.impressions_count > 5000 ORDER BY m.impressions_count DESC;

SELECT i.name AS influencer_name, c.start_date, c.end_date, cm.conversion_rate FROM influencers i INNER JOIN collaborations c ON i.influencer_id = c.influencer_id INNER JOIN campaign_metrics cm ON c.collaboration_id = cm.collaboration_id WHERE c.start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY cm.conversion_rate DESC;

SELECT i.name AS influencer_name, c.brand_name, cm.revenue_generated FROM influencers i INNER JOIN collaborations c ON i.influencer_id = c.influencer_id INNER JOIN campaign_metrics cm ON c.collaboration_id = cm.collaboration_id WHERE cm.revenue_generated > 1000 ORDER BY cm.revenue_generated DESC;
SELECT * FROM collaborations;
SELECT id, influencer_id, collaboration_date FROM collaborations;
SELECT influencer_id, brand_id, payment FROM collaborations WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT id, sponsor_id, start_date, end_date FROM sponsorships ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, engagement_rate, conversion_rate FROM campaign_metrics WHERE engagement_rate > 5;
SELECT * FROM influencer_profile WHERE followers > 100000 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, engagement_rate FROM campaign_metrics WHERE impressions > 50000 AND engagement_rate > 3.00;

SELECT c.id, i.name AS influencer_name, b.brand_id, c.collaboration_date, c.payment FROM collaborations c JOIN influencer_profile i ON c.influencer_id = i.id JOIN sponsorships s ON c.brand_id = s.sponsor_id JOIN campaign_metrics m ON c.id = m.campaign_id WHERE c.status = 'approved' AND s.start_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT s.id AS sponsorship_id, i.name AS influencer_name, s.start_date, s.end_date, s.sponsorship_fee FROM sponsorships s JOIN influencer_profile i ON s.influencer_id = i.id WHERE s.sponsorship_fee > 5000 AND s.start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY s.sponsorship_fee DESC, s.start_date;

SELECT i.name AS influencer_name, COUNT(c.id) AS total_collaborations, SUM(c.payment) AS total_payments FROM collaborations c JOIN influencer_profile i ON c.influencer_id = i.id GROUP BY i.name HAVING total_payments > 1000 ORDER BY total_payments DESC;
SELECT * FROM collaborations;
SELECT collaboration_id, influencer_id, brand_id FROM collaborations ORDER BY collaboration_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_start_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_budget > 1000;
SELECT * FROM campaign_metrics ORDER BY clicks ASC, impressions DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, total_followers FROM influencer_metrics WHERE engagement_rate > 0.05;
SELECT * FROM collaborations WHERE collaboration_date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT influencer_id, brand_id FROM sponsorships WHERE sponsorship_fee > 1000 ORDER BY sponsorship_start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_budget FROM campaigns WHERE brand_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM campaign_metrics WHERE clicks >= 100 AND conversions >= 5 ORDER BY impressions ASC;
SELECT total_followers, engagement_rate FROM influencer_metrics ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC, total_followers DESC;
